text: Peter Cellier (born 12 July 1928) is an English actor. He is known for his role as Sir Frank Gordon in Yes Minister and then Yes, Prime Minister in the 1980s. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Curriculum vitae Category:1928 births Category:Living people Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:Actors from Middlesex
title: Peter Cellier
